glsa.title: Links: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: An integer overflow in Links might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Links is a web browser which runs in both graphics and text modes.

description.p: An integer overflow vulnerability was found in the parsing of HTML tables in the Links web browser when running in graphical mode.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Links users should upgrade to the latest version:
